animated_sprite module¶

class animated_sprite.Animated_Sprite(image_file, rect, frame_rate, groups, colorkey=None)¶

Bases: pygame.sprite.Sprite

A sprite to be animated.

Parameters:
  • file_name – The file to be loaded for the image.”
  • rect – The rectangle for the animated sprite to fill.
  • frame_rate – How quickly the next frame of animation is displayed.
  • colorkey – Initially set to unknown, but can be set later.
